verses.text: Ix el winhaj Abraham chi' t'a yol yic winhaj Mamre, ix b'atcan cajan winh t'a yol yic Neguev t'a jun chonhab' scuch Gerar. Ha t'a skal Cades yet' Shur, ata' ay Gerar chi'.
Ayic ayek' winh ta', ix yal winh to manh yetb'eyumoc ix Sara winh, yanab' ix winh yalani. Ha winhaj Abimelec sreyal Gerar chi', ix schec winh ik'chajcot ix Sara chi' yic tz'och ix yetb'eyumoc yalani.
Ay jun ak'val, ix lolon Dios t'a winh rey chi' t'a svayich icha tik: Ol ach chamoc, yujto a ix ix, ix ik'cot etb'eyumoc alani, ay yetb'eyum ix, xchi t'a winh.
Palta manto vaylaj winh yet' ix Sara chi', yuj chi' ix yalan winh: Mamin, malaj in mul, ¿tom tzin a satel yet' in chonhab' tik?
Yujto a winhaj Abraham chi' ix alan t'ayin to yanab' ix winh. Ix yalanpax ix t'ayin: In nulej winh, xchi ix. Ha in tik ix in k'ulej t'a smasanil in k'ool, manhoc chukal naan vuuj, xchi winh rey chi'.
Ix tak'vi Dios t'a winh: Vojtac to ix a k'ulej jun tik t'a stojolal, yuj chi' maj in cha a yam ix, yic wach' max och a mul t'ayin.

Ha ticnaic, ak' meltzaj ix t'a winh yetb'eyum chi', yujto in checab' yaj winh. Syal slesalvi winh uuj yic max ach chami. Palta tato max ak' meltzaj ix jun, val yel ol ach chamoc, ol champax jantac eb' cajan ed'oc, xchi Dios t'a winh.
Axo ix q'uinhib'i, ix q'ue vaan winh rey chi', ix yavtancot masanil eb' schecab' winh, ix yalan winh t'a eb' tas ix svayichej chi'. Ayic ix yab'an jun chi' eb', ix te xiv eb'.

Ixlajwi chi' ix schecan winh rey chi' avtaj winhaj Abraham chi', ix yalan winh: --¿Tas yuj icha tik ix in utej? ¿Tas in mul t'ayach, yuj chi' ijan tzik'cot jun niwan mul tik t'a vib'anh yet' t'a yib'anh jantac eb' in chonhab' tik? Manh wach'oc ix in utej.
¿Tas ix a na' yuj chi' icha tik ix a k'ulej? xchi winh rey chi'.
Ix tak'vi winhaj Abraham chi' t'a winh: --Ha in naani to ha t'a jun lugar tik malaj mach xiv d'ha Dios. Q'uinaloc ay mach tzin mak'ancham yuj ix vetb'eyum tik in naani.
Val yel vanab' ix, yisil ix winh in mam, palta ch'oc snun ix, yuj chi' ix yal vik'lan in b'a yet' ix.
Ayic ix yalan Dios to tzin el t'a spat winh in mam, ix in k'anan pavor t'a ix to sch'ox swach'k'olal ix t'ayin, yuj chi' yalnhej b'aj tzonh eq'ui, syal ix to vanab' ix, xchi winhaj Abraham chi'.
Ix yak'anxi meltzaj ix Sara chi' winh t'a winhaj Abraham chi'. Ix ak'jipax nok' calnel, nok' vacax, eb' winh checab' yet' eb' ix checab' t'a winh yuj winh rey chi'.
Ix yalanxi winh rey chi' t'a winh: --Ina in macb'en tik, syal a sik'lani b'ajtil syal a cajnaji, xchi winh rey chi' t'a winh.

Ix yalanpax winh rey chi' t'a ix Sara: --Ix vak' mil siclo q'uen plata t'a winh a nulej tik, yic tz'och spacoc t'ayach, yic sco ch'oxaneli to malaj a mul ix ochi, yic wach' malaj mach syal yalan chukal t'a a patic, xchi winh t'a ix.

Ixlajwi chi' ix lesalvi winhaj Abraham chi' d'ha Dios yuj winhaj Abimelec chi'. Yuj chi' ix yik'xiel scatab' Dios chi' t'a yib'anh winh yet' ix yetb'eyum yet' eb' ix schecab' winh, yic tz'aljixi yune' eb' ix.
Yujto yujnhej ix Sara chi', manhxa junok eb' ix ayek' t'a spat winhaj Abimelec chi' ixto unevi junok tiempoal yuj Jehová.
